channel.title: Modeling & Skinning
channel.description: Got questions or tips, or just want to show off your work? Post here!

item.title: U2GemExport - Unreal2 Golem (*.gem) mesh/animation exporter to psk/psa.
item.author: invalid@example.com (VendorX)
item.dc:creator: VendorX
item.content:encoded:
Unreal2 Golem (*.gem) mesh/animation exporter to psk/psa.
------------------------
This is a fully worked commandline application written in C++ to export any Unreal2 Golem mesh/animation to psk/psa file format.


INSTALL
-------
Extract the contents of this RAR file to a Unreal2\Meshes directory on your PC;

Or...

Create a folder and then select/drag the content into the new folder - update commandline as well...


NOTES
-----
Don't expect that exported animations will be...

U2GemExport - Unreal2 Golem (*.gem) mesh/animation exporter to psk/psa.

item.title: Modded a player character mesh, what to do next.
item.author: invalid@example.com (ROSoldier)
item.dc:creator: ROSoldier
item.content:encoded:
Hi guys. I did the following: I exported the original game mesh and then put it in 3dsmax. I edited few vertices, and created a new polygon. Its a very basic simple fix.
So after doing this I can save this and then import in in Ued and do the coding and it will work.

the question is I may have missed something?
After editing polygons and creating a polygon from existing vertices, do I have to do the "smoothing groups" thing? Do I have to build "normal maps thing'?

I am a total...

Modded a player character mesh, what to do next.

item.title: Maya PLE
item.author: invalid@example.com (*mGm*Lizard)
item.dc:creator: *mGm*Lizard
item.content:encoded: How can I get Maya PLE to work on my computer? It came with my UT2004:ECE. I've tried installing it but it keeps asking me for an activation key. I've contacted Alias and they told me they weren't giving out licences anymore. So, what now?!?!?! If someone could help me, I would greatly appreciate it!

item.title: UC2 - StaticMesh decopmpilation
item.author: invalid@example.com (VendorX)
item.dc:creator: VendorX
item.content:encoded:
UC2 - StaticMesh decompilation

OK Guys... Unreal2 Golem is done now it's time for UC2 - yep, Unreal Championship 2... I'm working on UC2Decompiler - script export is almost done, but I need some help with StaticMesh decompilation. I mean, I have all needed data, but don't know how to link MeshTri with MeshVert to produce exportable data - probably to .psk (extention will be changed to .psm, but format will remain the same) .
If someone can explain to me correlations between those...

UC2 - StaticMesh decopmpilation

item.title: Skaarj Squad

item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
Some I made. Some I collected original templates (no team colors) from a now non·existant Unreal site. Some I got off Monster Hunt maps.

I team colored them all.


link cuz the pic is WIDE:
http://pics.livejournal.com/evilgrins/pic/00bppkpa

Names, left to right:
AMUK*5, AZMODEL, DAMNATION, FUGLY, GENE·FREAK, GODZLAYER, GRUNT, HISH, Huggable George, INDIGO, ION, JARHEAD, KING, MERC, MINION, MONGER, OZONE,...

Skaarj Squad

item.title: Custom models
item.author: invalid@example.com (cole_bie)
item.dc:creator: cole_bie
item.content:encoded:
If you want something added just post the topic you want it in, ie: mapping, coding, character creation, etc. Then underneath that post the actual tutorials and I will add them to the post.

General-
http://www.3dbuzz.com/-then go to downloads then unreal technology. this has some of the best video tuts I have ever seen.

www.3dtotal.com -There are a lot of tutorials for modeling, texturing etc.

www.poopinmymouth.com -(yeah, really!)...

Custom models

item.title: Upaint update missing.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Median12)
item.dc:creator: Median12
item.content:encoded:
I had to re-install UT2004/uPAINT onto a new PC and I lost the uPAINT update pack.

I tried the "Get Updates" from the painting software and it Error 404'd me.

I understand uPAINT is 11 years old but is there a link for this 'old' update?

item.title: Help importing .obj assets
item.author: invalid@example.com (gopostal)
item.dc:creator: gopostal
item.content:encoded:
The one thing I've tried to avoid over the years is advanced modelling. The spatial reasoning part of your brain that's used in creating them must be a charred and blackened mess in my head as I have spent more than one weekend trying to suss out roughly how it's done. (no offense 3DBuzz, that fail is on me)

I'm currently importing some assets and I need to bring some .obj files into the engine. They are gibs meshes that won't need animated and I already have existing textures to apply as...

Help importing .obj assets

item.title: Exporting an animated mesh to unreal engine 1
item.author: invalid@example.com (Blade_hunter)
item.dc:creator: Blade_hunter
item.content:encoded:
I have an important question and probably a request about being able to export animated meshes to _a.3d and _d.3d files from blender.

The thing is that blender 3d only have current plugins for some game engines but nothing for unreal engine 1 and I think this would be great for everyone to have such a tool for any unreal engine 1 modder

Though if that's not possible a .md2 to _a.3d / _d.3d file would be also great as blender can export to .md2.

I would like people being able to use...

Exporting an animated mesh to unreal engine 1

item.title: UKX - help me.
item.author: invalid@example.com (freeman239)
item.dc:creator: freeman239
item.content:encoded:
Hello guy's. I play alot time in the game, what call Splinter Cell Chaos Theory Versus (multiplayer). Versus basics on Unreal Engine 2.0. There inside in folder "Animation" a lot .ukx files. I already try to use UmodelViewer, UT2003, UE2 Runtime, tools from Lineage 2, UTPT, UESkelMeshViewer. Its not helped. Nothing work -.- , i cannot open this files, but from other's games its worked good, like SC 1-3 singleplayer, killzone, La2 li its all exported, but i need...

UKX - help me.

Feedback would be appreciated.

Arachi - {2} .:UT2004:.

item.title: Smite: Battleground of the Gods MODDING
item.author: invalid@example.com (warpdragon)
item.dc:creator: warpdragon
item.content:encoded:
Ok. It was stated in an interview that Smite uses a "modified" Unreal 3 Engine for their game. I've done some research and found that the Smite datamining/modding community is miniscule. I've come here to find out some stuff about reverse engineering their in-house asset package cooking process. Unless one has access to their modified engine or to the cooking algorthm - any assets introduced into the game folder (overriding existing assets) will crash the game. What kind of effort would it...

Smite: Battleground of the Gods MODDING

As Bizarros are imperfect creatures, team colors to match: the word "TEAM" on the bat-symbol on the front & back in each color....

No am Batzarro! (download)

item.title: NeoTokyo Boomer revolver WIP

item.content:encoded: Am doing this model for the Neotokyo mod as a favor, still very much a work in progress but its coming along! still have to add last details including hammer and make some adjustments over the mesh!

item.title: Good UVLayout Alternatives for the cheap or free
item.author: invalid@example.com (WedgeBob)
item.dc:creator: WedgeBob
item.content:encoded:
I was wondering if anyone knew of any free or very low cost alternatives to the all-famous and well-working headus UVLayout around. I was watching some videos from 3D Buzz on this nifty app, and wondered if there was anything similar to that which didn't break the bank... Certainly would make getting these UV maps done in the right way.

Now yes, I know that Blender has a good UV tool in it, but since I prefer XSI Mod Tool for modeling, obviously, Autodesk doesn't really give you that good...

Good UVLayout Alternatives for the cheap or free

Team colors on the clan-logo, front & back.

item.title: Skaarj / Wolverine skinning request
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
Most people that know something about me know I'm a bit of a Skaarj addict. I regularly skin the SKtrooper and I'm just all sorts of Skaarj kooky. Well, I'm also a big fan of Wolverine, and not because both he and Skaarj have retractable claws...

...though that's got a lot to do with this.

Wolverine's original costume is a little different than what he wears now:...

Skaarj / Wolverine skinning request

item.title: Horror Monster Model?
item.author: invalid@example.com (MastrJC)
item.dc:creator: MastrJC
item.content:encoded:
I'm making an indie horror game and I'm looking for a static mesh for a monster to put in my game. I'm looking for something like in scp-087-b type monster.
Thanks in advance.

item.content:encoded:
hi i need some help ? for some reason my textures are not applying itself to the player i need it to ? i'm try to apply a texture to the MetalGuardMesh.MetalGuard
for some reason i see it in instant-action but it gives me a error while i try to compile a u file. Any Ideas to help please

item.title: faces are not my strong suit
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
I skin:






Good with working with existing stuff, but I can't make faces worth a damn.

Is there a website or person that specializes in making heads/faces I could source for future projects?
